thread.title: Canadiens beat Sabres 7-2 to improve to 8-0 (Yahoo Sports)
thread.title_full: Canadiens beat Sabres 7-2 to improve to 8-0 (Yahoo Sports)

author: ASFN Admin
title: Canadiens beat Sabres 7-2 to improve to 8-0 (Yahoo Sports)
text: Posts: 54,486 Canadiens beat Sabres 7-2 to improve to 8-0 (Yahoo Sports) Andrei Markov had a goal and four assists and the Montreal Canadiens beat the Buffalo Sabres 7-2 on Friday night to run their season-opening winning streak to eight games. The Canadiens are two victories away from matching the NHL record set by the Toronto Maple Leafs in 1993-94 and matched by the Sabres in 2006-07. Brendan Gallagher and Dale Weise each scored twice, and Max Pacioretty and Torrey Mitchell also scored.
